remark.p: Special Assistant to the Under Secretary of State from March 1966
Special Assistant to Ambassador at Large W. Averell Harriman

Special Assistant to the Assistant Secretary of State for Public Affairs until March 1966; Special Assistant to the Under Secretary of State and Deputy Staff Director, Senior Interdepartmental Group, March 1966â€“September 1967; thereafter Special Assistant to the Ambassador at Large

Deputy Coordinator for Prisoner of War/Missing in Action Matters, Office of the Deputy Secretary of State, until August 1977; Deputy Assistant Secretary of State and Coordinator for Prisoner of War/Missing in Action Matters, Bureau of Human Rights and Humanitarian Affairs, from 1977 until late 1979; Director, Country Reports, Bureau of Human Rights and Humanitarian Affairs, 1979
